about_the_game:
A rare breed of starfish with healing properties known as "Vribyss" was recently discovered and exploited by the Kexxrans. This created the greatest refugee crisis the world has ever seen. While fleeing from the Kexxrans, Isla falls deep into a cave. As she searches for a way out, she encounters mysterious beings trapped there that may be able to help her get out.

Features:

• Short story-driven game
• Dynamic Difficulty Adjustment (DDA) based on one or more factors: current health, enemies (if any) defeated, and time to complete specific tasks.
• 1st/3rd person perspective
• Strafing mode
• Downloadable PDF strategy guide
• Downloadable documentation for "Non-Official PS5 DualSense Support"
• Alternate ending if the player pursues a mysterious object during a "time-sensitive" situation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 GTX (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
